title: Samsung Galaxy Note 20 event in under 9 minutes
description: Samsungs Unpacked 2020 event is all packed up. The Galaxy Note 20 and Note 20 Ultra are now real things, as are the Galaxy Tab S7 tablet, the Galaxy Watch 3, and the Galaxy Buds Live (FKA Beans). Also, it announced the new Galaxy Z Fold 2. Here's everything you need to see from the 90-minute event in just under 9 minutes.  Learn more:   0:00 Welcome 0:11 Note 20 & Note 20 Ultra 2:21 Galaxy Tab S7 & Tab S7 Plus 4:27 Xbox Game Pass  4:49 Galaxy Buds Live 5:59 Galaxy Watch 3 6:41 Galaxy Z Fold 2 7:43 Prices & availability dates  Subscribe:  Subscribe to Verge Science:   Read More:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:  More about our podcasts:   Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:
transcript: (Samsung members cheer) - Welcome to the Galaxy Unpacked 2020. We are excited to introduce five devices to our Galaxy Ecosystem. Let me start by introducing the all new Galaxy Note 20. - The new Galaxy Note 20 comes in two versions, the Note 20 and the Note 20 Ultra. The Note 20 has a 6.7 inch screen. And the Note 20 Ultra has a larger smartphone display yet in our Note series, at 6.9 inches. Once you experience the buttery smoothness of 120 Hertz display, it's really hard to go back. We're proud to bring that same experience to the Note 20 Ultra. We're happy to protect the new Note with the toughest glass ever on a smartphone. Note 20 and Note 20 Ultra have the fastest processors in the Galaxy Series. Advanced chip sets combined with our all-day intelligent battery, give you the power to last. And if you're ever running low, you can get more than 50% charge in just 30 minutes. They come with one camera on the front and three in the back. It comes with an all new Laser autofocus sensor and for Pro Video Mode, we also built in extra controls to give your videos, an extra kick. The Zoom Speed Controller is uber smooth. You can also make more precise adjustments on the microphone for great sound quality. - By the way, I noticed you use Samsung DeX. I love that it now connects wirelessly. - Yeah, and now I can use my phone while using my TV as a second screen with DeX. We're introducing two services to Note 20 and Note 20 Ultra. We collaborated closely with Android, as they developed Nearby Share. It automatically detects nearby users, making it simpler and quicker to share files across Android devices. The other is Samsung SmartThings Find, like the name applies, this helps you locate Galaxy Phones, Watches, and even Buds. The Note 20 Ultra is enabled with Ultra-wideband Technology, or UWB. It uses high bandwidth to measure range and direction with astonishing precision by simply pointing your phone to other UWB equipped Galaxy devices. Nearby Share will automatically list the people you're facing at the top of your sharing panel. - This is our all new Galaxy Tab S7. - Tab S7 comes in two sizes, an 11 inch model and the larger 12.4 inch Tab S7+ The Tab S7+ has the largest Super AMOLED on a tablet today. And remember that Ultra Smooth 120 Hertz display? We're bringing it to tablets for the first time. Despite the full metal design, it's very lightweight. The Tab S7 and S7+ come in three new color options. Now, where's the S Pen? Here it is. Convenient, right? This feels like a real pen and writes like one too. Combining the new S Pen with the new 120 Hertz display, we were able to significantly reduce latency. And now we're letting you run up to three apps simultaneously. The book cover keyboard is the most versatile keyboard for both work and play. The touch pad is now larger and supports the multi finger gestures. So it's easier to control your screen. We also enhanced our Samsung Notes app. - It's incredibly convenient that the app works through the cloud and you can open an edit all your notes on any Galaxy device, phone, tablet, or PC. - And this is not just for notes, you can sync your devices so you never miss a call or text, no matter what device you're using or how far away you are from your phone. Well, by syncing your Samsung Notes with your One Note Feed, your hand-drawn sketch on your Galaxy Note 20 will be available on different PC experiences like Outlook on the Web. Your reminders will show up on your PC and the To Do app, Teams and also here. And because it's synced, if you want it to take it a step further and schedule it as a task, you can do so by dragging and dropping it directly on your calendar. I'm excited to announce the new Apps Feature, which gives you access to your Android apps on your Note 20 directly from your PC. - And now we are expanding to gaming with Xbox. - We're entering a new era by bringing cloud gaming to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate on September 15th. You will be able to play over 100 games in the Game Pass membership from your phone. Together we'll deliver X-Box Game Pass Ultimate to Samsung phones and tablets, including to the Galaxy Note 20. - For those who pre-order and choose the gaming bundle, you'll get a Bluetooth controller and three months of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate free, when it launches on September 15th. - The Galaxy Buds Live. The Buds come in a choice of three colors, including the super chic mystic bronze, which I am personally loving. The Buds Live are also eco-friendly, both the Buds and the case are made of recycled materials. Ta da! The result is the 1st Open Type Buds in the Galaxy Series. The wingtips face up, just like this, and they fit perfectly in the curve of my ear. I get up to six hours of playtime and the charging case provides up to 21 hours in total. And the controls are easy and even customizable. Best of all, Buds Live have incredible high sound quality with powerful Bass Boost. You are going to love the Active of Noise Cancellation for Open Type. Buds Live provide the best call quality too, with three microphones and a Voice Pickup Unit. If you're making videos with your Note 20, the microphones on your Buds Live can give you exceptional sound quality. Introducing the Galaxy Watch 3, and it comes with the precision rotating bezel. and comes in two sizes and three colors. We even have a Super Premium Titanium Model, Mystic Black. The frame is smaller, slimmer and lighter, while the display itself is bigger. In Korea, Blood pressure is already available today and ECG will be coming real soon, for both the Watch 3 and Watch Active 2. The Galaxy Watch 3, will also let you check your blood oxygen level. The Watch 3 gives me real time feedback, tracking my pace and form based on my run. You can also set goals for yourself and see how far you run. - The all new Z Fold 2. - The Z fold 2 comes in two colors, Mystic Black, and what I have here, Mystic Bronze. Overall, the body is thinner and we minimized the gap between the screens. The new Z fold 2 spots a wider 6.2 inch full cover display. We've maximized the screen with our Hole in display technology, bringing our Infinity-O Display to the Z fold 2 across a beautiful 7.6 inches The Z Fold 2 embodies our 120 Hertz refresh rate technology. And additional upgrades. We optimized the display layers, reinforced the entire structure to make the phone tougher in real world environments. The Dual Intelligent Battery will last all day. We completely re-engineered the hinge of the Z fold 2. We're gonna share more details on September 1st. Pre-orders begin on that day too. - And there you have it. Five new products, designed to help you sail through everyday life. Galaxy Watch 3 and Buds Live will be available on August 6th. And Tab S7 and Tab S7+ will be released on August 21st. Finally, Note 20 and Note 20 Ultra, will be available in 5G models with all the models available in selected countries. Pre-orders begin tomorrow. Going forward, 5G and Foldable, will be the major pillars of Samsung's future. - Wow, there it is. The Galaxy Note 20. - And here it, is the Tab S7. - Oh wow, that looks so beautiful. Don't you guys think? - Are you guys seeing this? - I see our Samsung members are really excited.
transcript_entity_values: the Active of Noise Cancellation for Open Type
a Super Premium Titanium Model, Mystic Black
